title: If I fused hydrogen and oxygen to produce water, will it be consumable? - Quora

response.answer_text: After you let it cool. Fusing hydrogen and oxygen is called ‘combustion’. The reaction between the two is highly energetic.  The end result of this is water vapor. Very hot water vapor. Even if you managed to catch it, consuming superheated steam is generally a bad idea. But, if you catch it and let it cool and condense, then yes, you end up with ordinary, pure water, which you can very easily drink.
Definitely yes you can. But the water you produce is a distilled water that is free from all the impurities or minerals. Actually you produces the purest form of water. It won't hurt you.
